intro: Anthospermum humile, commonly known as the small anthospermum, is a flowering plant belonging to the Rubiaceae family. It is a small, herbaceous annual that typically grows in tropical and subtropical regions. The plant features opposite, ovate leaves with hairy surfaces and produces small, clustered flowers with white to pale pink petals. Its fruit is a capsule that contains numerous tiny seeds. Anthospermum humile is often found in disturbed soils and is adapted to thrive in moist, shaded environments.
